authors: Aqua Alex, Matthew Carpenter, Roric, Orp, Zeko
instructions: Kudos for Aqua Alex, Matthew Carpenter, Roric and Orp, who did the hard work. This is just the original 7ed character with their skills alphabetically ordered in Spanish. As for now, Cthulhu Invictus and Cthulhu 1920s are available.

useroptions.description: Pulp Cthulhu Character Sheet. Overlays the already selected sheet with Pulp's colors. Automatically sets doubles HP (as per Pulp rules) and includes Archetype next to the Occupation input. *!*To include Pulp Talents and Pulp Bouts of Madness, you need to also select them Below.*!*
Doubles HP as per Pulp Cthulhu rules. (This does not need to be selected if the Pulp setting is already in place.)
Replaces the normal Bouts of Madness with their Pulp equivalents
Adds section for noting Pulp Talents
